channel.title: Top Section on NewsStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Top Section on NewsStreet

item.title: Young writer, once a catering steward, now has his poems taught in universities
item.description: Young writer, once a catering steward, now has his poems taught in universities Ramesh Karthik, who used to work as a steward in catering events to earn some money to publish his books, has been writing on the culture and lifestyle of Banjara communities, adding a dash of fiction.

item.title: Telangana best among other Indian states in organ donation: Harish Rao
item.description: Telangana best among other Indian states in organ donation: Harish Rao State government will use choppers to transport donated organs of the brain dead patients from districts hospitals to teaching hospitals
